verses.text: \w Though|strong="G1437"\w* I \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* with the \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*, I am \w become|strong="G1096"\w* \add as\add* \w sounding|strong="G2278"\w* \w brass|strong="G5475"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* a \w tinkling|strong="G0214"\w* \w cymbal|strong="G2950"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w though|strong="G1437"\w* I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \add the gift of\add* \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w understand|strong="G1492"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w mysteries|strong="G3466"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w though|strong="G1437"\w* I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, so \w that|strong="G5620"\w* I could \w remove|strong="G3179"\w* \w mountains|strong="G3735"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*, I \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w though|strong="G1437"\w* I \w bestow|strong="G5595"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w goods|strong="G5224"\w* to \w feed|strong="G5595"\w* \add the poor\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w though|strong="G1437"\w* I \w give|strong="G3860"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* be \w burned|strong="G2545"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*, it profiteth \w me|strong="G5623"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w Charity|strong="G0026"\w* suffereth \w long|strong="G3114"\w*, \add and\add* is \w kind|strong="G5541"\w*; \w charity|strong="G0026"\w* \w envieth|strong="G2206"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*; \w charity|strong="G0026"\w* \w vaunteth|strong="G4068"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w itself|strong="G4068"\w*, \w is|strong="G5448"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* puffed \w up|strong="G5448"\w*,

Doth \w not|strong="G3756"\w* behave \w itself|strong="G0807"\w* \w unseemly|strong="G0807"\w*, \w seeketh|strong="G2212"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* her \w own|strong="G1438"\w*, \w is|strong="G3947"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* easily \w provoked|strong="G3947"\w*, \w thinketh|strong="G3049"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*;

\w Rejoiceth|strong="G5463"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w iniquity|strong="G0093"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* rejoiceth \w in|strong="G4796"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*;

\w Beareth|strong="G4722"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w hopeth|strong="G1679"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w endureth|strong="G5278"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w Charity|strong="G0026"\w* \w never|strong="G3763"\w* \w faileth|strong="G1601"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \add there be\add* \w prophecies|strong="G4394"\w*, they shall \w fail|strong="G2673"\w*; \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \add there be\add* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*, they shall \w cease|strong="G3973"\w*; \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \add there be\add* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*, it shall vanish \w away|strong="G2673"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w in|strong="G1537"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* we \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w* \w in|strong="G1537"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* that which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* is \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w then|strong="G5119"\w* that which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1537"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w* shall be done \w away|strong="G2673"\w*.

\w When|strong="G3753"\w* I \w was|strong="G2252"\w* a \w child|strong="G3516"\w*, I \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w child|strong="G3516"\w*, I \w understood|strong="G5426"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w child|strong="G3516"\w*, I \w thought|strong="G3049"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w child|strong="G3516"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* I \w became|strong="G1096"\w* a \w man|strong="G0435"\w*, I put \w away|strong="G2673"\w* \w childish|strong="G3516"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w now|strong="G0737"\w* we \w see|strong="G0991"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* a \w glass|strong="G2072"\w*, \w darkly|strong="G0135"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w then|strong="G5119"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w face|strong="G4383"\w*: \w now|strong="G0737"\w* I \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w in|strong="G1537"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w then|strong="G5119"\w* shall I \w know|strong="G1921"\w* even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* I am \w known|strong="G1921"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* \w abideth|strong="G3306"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*, \w these|strong="G5023"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* the \w greatest|strong="G3187"\w* of \w these|strong="G5130"\w* \add is\add* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w*.
